original_text: And the book is delivered to him that is not learned, saying, Read this, I pray thee: and he saith, I am not learned.
korean_text: 또 그 책을 글 모르는 자에게 주며 이르기를 그대에게 청하노니 이를 읽으라 하면 그가 대답하기를 나는 글을 모른다 할 것이니라

sentences.original_text: to him that is not learned
saying, Read this, I pray thee
and he saith, I am not learned
